original_title: The Bachelor Murder Mystery: Who Murdered the Bachelor?
overview: The most famous bachelor in the galaxy is dating the world's most beautiful woman and living a lifestyle of fantasy. But then a global virus threatens The Lifestyle. Thankfully, he's also the world's most famous secret agent. To save the planet he decides to run for President of the United States. Unfortunately for him, there are women all over the world that would kill to be his First Lady. Will he survive til Election Day? If not,
title: The Bachelor Murder Mystery: Who Murdered the Bachelor?
